title: PC 17 March - demonstration against the imperialist mission aspides in Rome on Friday 22 March - adhesion and support of 'communist proletarians'
content:
Sending A military fleet in the Red Sea in the framework of the European Mission Aspides, Italy is involved in the ongoing war in the middle East and becomes an accomplice of the genocide in Palestine.

Still Once Italy proves to be a servant of the state of Israel, such as We saw well on January 27 and how we are seeing these days, In addition to the naval mission, with arrests against activists Palestinians following the request for extradition of Anan Yaeesh advanced by the Zionist state.

Self The population is not fully aware, government and parliament Italian are totally responsible for it, having voted in favor of This new military adventure that deploys Italy and Europe alongside of the Zionist Israelis.

THE Italian military commands took the opportunity waiting for time to intervene militarily in what they call the "Allaroal Mediterranean", a conception that includes, in addition to the coasts Mediterranean, also the Black Sea (where the war in an encouraged today Ukraine), the Red Sea and the Persian Gulf (where the consequences of the war in the Middle East and the genocide of

Palestinians), widening to the Indian Ocean to the coasts Westerners of India (where the clash between the United States and China looms) and to the Gulf of Guinea in West Africa.

This Bellicist vocation was ratified by the Maritime Security Strategy of the European Union of 10 March 2023, where a "Direct impact on European security and prosperity" and where the EU "He must extend his influence with the ships of the member countries".

That in the Red Sea, as well as a mission to defend naval traffic from the attacks of the Houthi Yemeniti who fight alongside the Palestinian resistance, it is also a mission that aims to redefine the areas of competence and control by poles and powers in competition.

We say that the Italian and European military fleet in the Red Sea must be withdrawn before the war events become a further "accomplished fact" e A new front of world war in pieces that looms over the world.
We intend to give life to a first event for the retreat of Italy from the Aspides mission in the Red Sea and against the involvement of our country in the wars and in the genocide in progress a Gaza.

Today as yesterday the fascists in power drag the country into the war. They were stopped then, they must be stopped again now!

We will manifest our opposition to war, the work of the government and to Complication silence of Parliament, Friday 22 March in Piazza dei Consoli, near the headquarters of the Interforze Operating Committee (Covi), a Start from 18:00.

To join, write to:imporrelapace@gmail.com

They promote and adhere:Committee "Angelo Baracca", an observatory against the militarization of schools e of universities, Alas - Student Student Workers Association, Ass. Naz. For the school of the Republic ODV, student opposition alternative, change course, basic union union, forum Palestine, Palestine Committee in the heart, Intifada, Palestinian community of Rome and Lazio, Udap - Palestinian Arab Democratic Union, Palestinian Student Movement, Power to the People, Communist Party Italian, Party of the Communist Refoundation, Socialist homeland, Network of the Communists, your hands down from Africa, Plam - progressive platform Latin American, JVP Sri Lanka Committee in Italy, Contropiano.org, Pace Committee and no longer war, demanding disarms, Wilpf, NO NALO WAR, List NO NATO, Repression Observatory, G.A.MA.DI., Confederation Italian left,
